Actions.Name: Great Holy
Actions.Effect: Foes inside are branded. Branded foes must save or become pacified.

Actions.Name: Denial
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 must save or become unable to attack until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, they take [fray] damage and are electrified instead. Electrified foes fail the save.

Actions.Name: Weaken
Actions.Description: A foe in range 5 is pacified.

Actions.Name: Immaculate
Actions.Description: An ally in range 5 becomes Intangible until the end of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Gran Redempta
Actions.Description: All defeated allies in range 3 are revived, removing incapacitated. They stop being defeated and return with 50% hp. They can act normally and take a turn starting next round.
